statements: DELETE FROM EnergyConsumptionPatterns WHERE id = 101 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_patterns WHERE energy_consumed > 1000 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM solar_panel_inventory WHERE panel_type = 'Monocrystalline' OR location = 'California';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE consumption > 1000 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM solar_panels WHERE capacity < 500 AND installation_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_type = 'Monocrystalline' AND installation_date > '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM EnergyUsage WHERE Date = '2022-10-15' AND UserID = 201;
